name: Battle Surge
description:
Battle against enemy ships to take control of all lost sectors!

Controls:

- Arrow keys to move the camera around.

- Drag the cursor over your ships to control them.

- Right click to send them to a location.

Notes:

The yellow bars represent the sectors belonging to each side. 

The green bar represents your ships left, while the red one shows the enemy ships left.

A js13kGames entry.
